Sentencas: A novel SOFC hybrid system is proposed and evaluated relative to its thermodynamic efficiency and economy.
Titulo: Performance analysis of an SOFC/HCCI engine hybrid system: System simulation and thermo-economic comparison

Sentencas: The proposed system combines an SOFC stack with an HCCI-type internal combustion engine; the HCCI engine replaces a conventional combustor, simultaneously bums the anode off-gas, and produces additional power.
Titulo: Performance analysis of an SOFC/HCCI engine hybrid system: System simulation and thermo-economic comparison

Sentencas: To calculate the efficiency of the suggested system, each component and the overall system have been thermodynamically modeled.
Titulo: Performance analysis of an SOFC/HCCI engine hybrid system: System simulation and thermo-economic comparison

Sentencas: The levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) has been calculated and economically assessed.
Titulo: Performance analysis of an SOFC/HCCI engine hybrid system: System simulation and thermo-economic comparison

Sentencas: For quantitative comparison and evaluation, a simple SOFC system and an SOFC/GT hybrid system are designed.
Titulo: Performance analysis of an SOFC/HCCI engine hybrid system: System simulation and thermo-economic comparison

Sentencas: Consequently, the proposed hybrid system shows the efficiency 59.5%, which is 7.8% and 0.9% higher efficiency than those of the SOFC simple system and the SOFC/GT hybrid system, respectively.
Titulo: Performance analysis of an SOFC/HCCI engine hybrid system: System simulation and thermo-economic comparison

Sentencas: And the system exhibits the LCOE $0.23/kWh, that is 12.9% and 7.6% reduced LCOE compared with the other two reference cases.
Titulo: Performance analysis of an SOFC/HCCI engine hybrid system: System simulation and thermo-economic comparison
